page.title: 16BACKWELL SCHOOL
page.content: Our school serves four main areas Yatton, Cleeve, Claverham and Backwell.Free coaches are provided for pupils who live four or more miles away.A school day begins at 8.50am with registration, then two lessons before break.Break lasts for twenty minutes, during this we play hand squash, slams(a variation of hand squash) chat and do homework. We then have two more lessons. At 12.40pm we have lunch. At 1.55pm we have a 20 minute tutor period, although on Wednesdays and Fridays there's assembly. Uniform is compulsory for 1st _5th years, but only the 1st years look really neat and conventional. Backwell School has modern buildings scattered over a large site, with many trees and an enormous playing field. It has a reputation for good exam results and behaviour.
